content: During this call, we may make forward-looking statements about our future expectations and plans including with respect of the timing and initiation and progress of and data reported from the preclinical and clinical trials of our product candidates, regulatory filings, including the review of the BLA for Omidubicel by the FDA, commercialization planning efforts, the potentially life-saving or curative therapeutic and commercial potential of Gamida Cell's product candidates, including GDA-201 and Omidubicel, and our expectations regarding our projected cash, cash equivalent, and investment to be used for operating activities.
